name: Crazy Destruction
description:
Crazy Destruction is a 3D physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Take control of a mechanical cannon and destroy everything in your path! Using tactics and thinking, calculate every shot you take, because you're running out of ammunition!

Become a real master of destruction and destroy everything you come across! Show off your shooting skills to win!

Game Features:
- Lots of levels
- Complete destruction of objects
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
